item.title: Shop help please
item.dc:creator: @Jessica1294 Jessica1294
item.description:
@Jessica1294 wrote:

I used this:

[Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 882) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 Gypsy_Potions 1 1 189 1000 187 1000 182 1000 176 1000 170 1000 164 1000 158 1000 152 1000 146 1000 140 1000 134 1000 128 1000 122 1000 122 1000 114 1000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
882 2647 3659 02645 3661 2649 3659 1 Selling_Potions!

( If you have problem with the thing put NPC cords=true just copy the above one and paste it on this one)

Ok i did this this is my Gypsy Potion shop!! Ok this is set to spawn south west of the main fremnik hall. Ok all these codes are in where they should,compiled, and server was re ran. But the gypsy dont spawn there and its just still an empty little house. I used the shopmaker tool… So the codes shouldnt be wrong… Help?

Read full topic
